plot: Director Jules Dassin (Night and the City) combines the best of film noir, crime caper and romance in this little gem starring Lucille Ball, John Hodiak and Lloyd Nolan.
title: Two Smart People

cast.role: Maria Ynez, Inn of the 4 Winds
